definitions.body: basin, goblet (NH [[סַף]]; Ph. [[סף]] (Inscr. of Tyre:(1), 5, 6) Schröd:ZMG xxxix (1886), 317 f. Cl-Gann:Annales du Musêe Guimet x. 511 = Recuell d'arch. orient.(1886), 89 Hal:RÉJ xii.107 Bloch; but Lzb:330 door-sill);—´[[ס]] abs.basin Ex 12:22, Ex 12:22 (J; containing blood of passover lamb); cstr. [[סַף־רַעַל]] Zec 12:2 goblet of reeling (intoxicating, fig.), prob. also Hb Hab 2:15, where rd. [[מִסַּף חֲמָֽתְְ]] from the goblet of thy fury  (for MT ´[[מְסַפֵּחַ ח]], v. I. [[ספח]]); pl. abs. [[סַפּוֹת]] 2Sa 17:28 basins for ordinary use; [[הַסִּפִּים]] Je 52:19, [[הַסִפּוֹת]] 1Ki 7:50 and cstr. [[סִפּוֹת כֶּסֶף]] 2Ki 12:14, of temple utensils.
